file_content.text: We'll salvage droids, use to repair damage to tunnels. Seems fair.
Yes, yes! Droids are deactivating all over tunnels, we are safe!
You have proven great friendship with us. We will not forget. Here, this we found among droid debris. Is proper to share with your friends.
Please. Droid cores are the only way to finding Vermilion.
Excuse, please. You are a Jedi? An ally of us Selonians? Please to help.
Excuse, please. You wear Havoc Squad colors. An ally of us Selonians? Please to help.
You are Republic? An ally of us Selonians? Please to help.
You are Republic friends? Allies of us Selonians? Please to help.
Our tunnels, our den, are invaded. Not Imperials, but assassin droids. Very terrible... so many den-mates dead.
But these droids, we know. Belong to local bounty hunter called Vermilion--uses droids for his dirty work. The Empire must have hired to kill us.
Your people are warriors, hunters. What can a few droids do to you?
You can't handle some droids?
Are specially programmed to hunt us. No scent, silenced... we know nothing until is too late.
I take it the Selonians crossed paths with Vermilion in the past.
You seem to know him well.
Yes. He accepted contract on a den mother. Learned how to fight us. Must be why Empire chose.
You could try sealing the tunnels, maybe set a trapfall for these droids or short them out somehow.
Let's talk defenses.
Have tried. And destroyed many, but Vermilion is always sending more.
If this bounty hunter was any sort of gentleman, he'd come out and get killed in person.
He sounds like scum.
Must fear Selonians' power. Are we not warriors? Instead Vermilion attacks from distance, like furless coward.
That's oddly specific.
Our tunnels are major access hub, can get to lots of places. Must be what the Empire is wanting.
But we are allies. You will not help? Not even listen?
Without finding and stopping Vermilion, attacks will never end. His droids are key to finding. Their memory cores will trace to him.
But droids are designed to fight Selonians. We cannot face and survive. Please, please to help.
I'll find Vermilion for you.
This is kindness--thank you. To find Vermilion should not be difficult.
You mentioned memory cores.
Go into tunnels, destroy droids--many as you can--and take memory cores. Scanning cores should trace where last orders came from.
Then find Vermilion. Strike. Until he is gone, tunnels are death trap for us.
Can't help you. [Refuse quest]
Then you are no friend to us.
Empire grows bolder. Sends hunters into our own homes.
Master Jedi? You go down into the tunnels to strike at Coronet Shipping, yes?
I am Lachei. I helped to scout the way for you... and there are more than beasts in those old dens.
Droids--specialized for slaughter of native species--guard the far end of the tunnels. They have butchered more of my people than can be counted. Please--help us stop them.
I'll be glad to help.
Things are tough all around.
That's terrible.
You understand well. This war is not ours, but it destroys us all the same.
You have helped us before. Will you not help again?
The droids are crafty, always communicating in secret, always organized--it is how they hunt. One droid, greater than the others, commands their movements.
Destroy some of the droids and steal their communicators. Use them to hunt the droid who commands and destroy it as well. Without coordination, our foes will become easy prey.
No problem at all.
You do us a great help. We will never forget.
Of course.
Excuse, please. You wear the colors of Havoc Squad--you travel now to the tunnels leading to Coronet Shipping, yes?
Excuse, please. You are friend to the Republic? Traveling down into the tunnels leading to Coronet Shipping?
Then our hunt begins. We will avenge our fallen brothers and sisters--all thanks to you.
You have proven great friendship with us. We will not forget. Please, take this--is proper to share with friends.
Droid communicators are the only way of finding their leader./
